name: Slime Stampede
description:
You play as a slime who breaks out in a lab studying radioactive goo - (the scientists clearly didn't realize it was sentient.) Help your fellow slimes escape by destroying objects around the lab and form a massive hivemind of pure destruction!!
See how many objects you can break!

Theme - Radiation, Limitation - One Handed

~~ Controls ~~
Mouse near the edge of the screen to scroll!
Right click to move!
Left click to shoot!
Esc. or, in the spirit of things, Middle-click to pause!

Originally created for Mini Jam 76, but I was unable to make the deadline due to a file corruption. Lesson learned!
Thanks to my friends who encouraged me to rebuild this project after it was lost <3
